llm_res.rule: transferFrom: Transfers _value amount of tokens from address _from to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
Callers MUST handle false from returns (bool success). Callers MUST NOT assume that false is never returned!
allowance function should return the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
